body_html:
@saeta Would appreciate if you can give some feedback on my comments above. I think address translation at run-time will still bring great value - we just need to make sure it only happens when appropriate.

The design already makes the feature an opt-in feature - we can add additional check to make sure the feature is only enabled for the right worker.

body:
@saeta Would appreciate if you can give some feedback on my comments above. I think address translation at run-time will still bring great value - we just need to make sure it only happens when appropriate.

The design already makes the feature an opt-in feature - we can add additional check to make sure the feature is only enabled for the right worker.
